participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and driven, with a passion for music and expression. Enjoys engaging in conversations about art and life.
participant_1.background: i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza. i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my pets name is charlie.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Resilient and introspective, constantly working on personal growth and healing. Open to discussing life experiences and challenges.
participant_2.background: i now live in the city. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm.

content.text: what do you do for a living? i produce music.
